adrFormatAddress: 37 Murray St Lower Level, New York, NY 10007, USA

originalText.text: Getting eye surgery is not something I wanted just anyone to do. I have a lot of allergies and am sensitive to medications so my eye doctor referred me to Dr. Koster. I'm so glad he did. Having a doctor who is personable, willing to understandably explain my cataract surgery, take the time to answer all my questions without rushing me, having the experience and knowledge of the latest medical technology all in one person is hard to find. In addition, all of his staff including Dr. Pagano, Debra and Genesis to name a few, went out of their way to make sure I was fully informed and supported so I knew everything was taken care of and I didn't have to worry about a thing. The procedure and process were painless. I cannot say enough praises for Dr. Koster and the NY Vision Group--Murray Street Office. I went from not being able to see much at all with both my eyes to about 20/25. It's like getting a new pair of eyes! Thank you all so much!

originalText.text: I had ICL done on both eyes. My regular optometrist highly recommended Dr. Koster. I had a longer recovery time than usual on my first eye, which was frustrating, but Dr. Koster and team (who are great) worked with me and I was patient and just had my second eye down and it is phenomenally unreal to live without glasses or contacts! Totally a different world!

text.text: I had ICL done on both eyes. My regular optometrist highly recommended Dr. Koster. I had a longer recovery time than usual on my first eye, which was frustrating, but Dr. Koster and team (who are great) worked with me and I was patient and just had my second eye down and it is phenomenally unreal to live without glasses or contacts! originalText.text: My vision was getting worse due to cataracts over the last few years. NY Vision Group was recommended by my optometrist for the surgery. From the initial appointment through surgery on both eyes (painless) and follow-up, the entire experience has been wonderful. Dr Koster and the entire staff at the Murray Street location are great.  Dr Koster took me through all my options, recommended the right lenses and the right surgery type.  He and the team were tremendous. The office is clean and COVID protocols strictly adhered to. I now have the most amazing vision and feel like a whole new set of eyes.  Wish I had done it sooner.  Thank you Dr Koster and team.

originalText.text: Every single person at this office was so nice and accommodating! I was nervous about my appointment but they made everything so easy. Would definitely come back.

originalText.text: Dr Koster is the best. He explains everything and is very knowledgeable. My expeirance was remarkable.  His staff is always so friendly both at the Tribeca office as well as all the staff at his Grammery location. THANK YOU DR KOSTER!
